scripts.test:integration: dotenv -e .env.local.test -- prisma migrate deploy && dotenv -e .env.local.test -- vitest run integration.test.ts
scripts.test:start_database: docker run --name recipeamigo-test-database -p 5433:5432 -e POSTGRES_USER=recipeamigo-test-user -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=recipeamigo-test-password -e POSTGRES_DB=recipeamigo-test-database --rm postgres:15 &
scripts.test: npm run test:start_database && sleep 5 && dotenv -e .env.local.test -- prisma migrate deploy && dotenv -e .env.local.test -- vitest run && npm run test:stop_database
scripts.test:integration:ci: prisma migrate deploy && vitest run integration.test.ts
